MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in CW1 & CW3 postcode areas of Crewe, affecting properties in Lime Tree Avenue, Sorbus Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9:41PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and repair the fault  and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12:45AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 9:43PM on 8th November 2020
